Adrenaline Slacklines

About the Project

Adrenaline Slacklines is a sports company focused on producing high quality slacklining equipment. I am currently the sole developer of their new web and mobile e-commerce interface.

Tech Stack:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • jQuery
  • Sass

Delta Upsilon

About the Project

I created the Delta Upsilon website during my last semester in college along with another member. The site is primarily built in PHP and it's main feature is the scholarship applicant dashboard that makes it easy to filter applicants.

Tech Stack:

  • PHP
  • JavaScript
  • D3.js
  • Sass

Links

Web

Atgora

About the Project

Atgora is a task management tool that I created. It is highly customizable and allows for users to program repetitive tasks. It is currently under development for both web (Ruby on Rails) and mobile (iOS).

Tech Stack:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • Backbone.js
  • iOS

Links

Web

Chapter One

About the Project

Chapter One is a crowdsourcing platform for young teen novels. I developed the idea from an article I read interviewing Kevin Rose and decided to implement it for the experience of building a crowdsourcing platform.

Tech Stack:

  • Ruby on Rails
  • jQuery
  • Sass
  • Backbone.js
